titleStmt.title: The spirit of the hat, or, The government of the Quakers among themselves as it hath been exercised of late years by George Fox, and other leading-men, in their Monday, or second-days meeting at Devonshire-House, brought to light : in a bemoaning letter of a by G.I.
titleStmt.author: Mucklow, William, 1631-1713.

notesStmt.note: Reproduction of original in the Huntington Library.
